snippet: Joseph J. Lhota, the unsuccessful Republican mayoral candidate, will be a senior vice president with NYU Langone Medical Center.
abstract: New York University hires Joseph J Lhota, Republican who ran against Bill de Blasio for New York City mayor, as senior vice president, vice dean and chief of staff at NYU Langone Medical Center.
lead_paragraph: Joseph J. Lhota, the unsuccessful Republican mayoral candidate, will be a senior vice president with NYU Langone Medical Center.

headline.main: Medical Center Hires Lhota as an Executive
headline.print_headline: Medical Center Hires Lhota As an Executive

keywords.value: New York University Langone Medical Center
keywords.name: organizations
